Class Handler

  • Method Details

    • getGraph

      public static Graph<String> getGraph​(String[] rowArray)
      The task is to find all the words which differ one letter only from each other and create a graph. The method takes the first word from the array received and substitutes every letter with regex (\w) one by one searching whether there are words which match. After searching, the method having put all words found into the temporary Set (tempBox) creates new vertices and removes the word from array. The algorithm does the same work with all the words from array. The static method performs a specified task and returns an object of Graph. The speed of the algorithm is satisfactory and enough for us as we are constrained the amount of the words in English dictionary. According to the results of tests, 5000 words are checked in 10 seconds and 10 000 in 45 seconds although neither the former nor the latter are hardly possible.
      Parameters:
      rowArray - For example, there are some data of all 5 letters words from the text, which will be structured according to a specified task and added in the graph
      Returns:
      An object of Graph
